shopifyCollection.title: Locations
shopifyCollection.description: Where ever you live, Oxford Pennant's got you covered with pennants, camp flags, and banners to represent your favorite places.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Where ever you live, Oxford Pennant's got you covered with pennants, camp flags, and banners to represent your favorite places.

products.title: Illustrated Buffalo, NY Pennant - New York • Oxford Pennant Original
products.description: td {border: 1px solid #ccc;}br {mso-data-placement:same-cell;} This custom Buffalo, NY pennant features a 1930s textbook illustration. Perfect for Buffalo sports fans and anyone who's spent a winter in the Queen City. Get this pennant framed! Size: 9" x 27" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design Color: Gold
products.descriptionHtml:
This custom Buffalo, NY pennant features a 1930s textbook illustration. Perfect for Buffalo sports fans and anyone who's spent a winter in the Queen City.

Get this pennant framed!

Size: 9" x 27"

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt, screen-printed design

Color: Gold
